attributes.action: Wearing of Diamond and Golden Jubilee medals
attributes.additional_details: That HM Government pass the appropriate primary or secondary legislation to permit retired members of the Armed Forces and Emergency Services, including HM Coastguard and the RNLI who retired before 2002 and  who served during the reign of HM Queen Elizabeth II, to be allowed to purchase at their own expense, and on approriate occasions wear, the Golden and Diamond Jubilee Medals issued to commemorate 50 and 60 years of the Queen's reign.
